object.name: getMyShortDescription
object.description: Use this method to get the current bot short description for the given user language. Returns BotShortDescription on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to get the current bot short description for the given user language. Returns BotShortDescription on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to get the current bot short description for the given user language. Returns :class:`aiogram.types.bot_short_description.BotShortDescription` on success.

annotations.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string
annotations.html_description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string
annotations.rst_description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string
annotations.name: language_code
